ai-tika-s0403t21:2_1: In the second place where the first monk abuses, reviles, “You’re a robbery,” “You’re a donkey,” he abused and insulted them.
ai-tika-s0403t21:2_2: “Oh, the shavelings! I’ll go to the royal snake families! I’ll make an end to the royal family tradition.” They say, “Go away, I’ll keep on doing what you said,” and they said, “I’ll do not say.”
ai-tika-s0403t21:2_3: The supermundane state of the supermundane state, wearing the unsurpassed path, one is born in the cleansing of the supramundane states, say, “This is the meaning of the supramundane state.”
ai-tika-s0403t21:2_4: you should say, ‘Nothing is to be spoken.’
ai-tika-s0403t21:3_0: The About the Congregation of the Ascetics is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_1: In the third immaterial states, etc., here there is the word “has unvirtuous,” “It is unvirtuous,” it is said of such virtue in the Paṭisambhidā.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_2: Having broken virtue, (will as) destroyed at the time of the schismatics, the break in virtue, so for one who has broken through some reason.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_3: But anyone who does not possess all virtues that are inferior, medical, and superior. And how is called an “restraint in the world?”
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_4: And so that it would be good if they were slaughtered here and there, a schismatic destiny, and after breaking the schism.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_5: For what is called restraint, restraint is destroyed.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_7: Do not kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_8: The bad reputation brings about the sound of drums.
ai-tika-s0403t21:5_9: Through full awareness he is remorseful only through his regret,
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_0: As he is unethical, of bad character:
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_1: live constructed in the place where the women are kept.
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_2: he returns to the Vedas, he is a reciter.
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_3: Having looked at it, they looked at the root of the world of his wives and children, and incorporating the whole world.
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_4: Having looked at the celestial World looking at the place where it can be transferred to another.
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_5: Hence it is said: “He is because he is no defeat.”
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_6: (The fifth), “He” is said, “When the five drawbacks” and so on, the fifth drawbacks of placing the mind and so on.
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_7: But when the danger of the Buddhas spoken is spoken of in the way already described, he thought, “How may that danger be that to say about the purpose of seeing the dangers for the purpose of seeing, etc., just as they are.”
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_8: praiseworthy for a wise one who possesses virtue,
ai-tika-s0403t21:6_9: When he is accomplished in ethics, has such qualities, that virtue is like water, educated with the meaning, and that vows of indication.
ai-tika-s0403t21:7_0: The commentary on the foreheads is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t21:8_0: The Congregation of the abusers is finished.
